title: 1.16 spigot端一下午崩溃了5次
author: 百度丶
txt_content:
这是其中最后三次的崩溃日志，看不太明白，感觉看不出什么问题，是内存不够了吗？用的阿里云服务器。







2020-06-29-4.log


2020-6-29 18:26 上传
点击文件名下载附件




23.89 KB, 下载次数: 7












2020-06-29-6.log


2020-6-29 18:26 上传
点击文件名下载附件




20.1 KB, 下载次数: 11












2020-06-29-5.log


2020-6-29 18:26 上传
点击文件名下载附件




123.41 KB, 下载次数: 6

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 DreamVoid 于 2020-6-29 21:56 编辑 

首先我建议你更换paperspigot
镜像站：https://yivesmirror.com
 似乎你的3次崩服都是因为服务器过载，如果你不能升级你的服务器配置的话更换成paperspigot是很好的选择

关于兼容性：paperspigot基于spigot开发，理论兼容全部spigot配置并且还有自行优化，对于你这种没什么插件的服务器更加友好

补充：楼上说有人移动太快，可能的原因是你的服务端卡了然后处理不过来移动数据包的原因，然后视为异常数据包取消了这个数据包。如果真的是这个原因的话那么你查谁移动快是没有意义的

replies.author: QWERTY770
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1683239263 于 2020-6-29 21:55 编辑 

[18:00:05] [Server thread/WARN]: xxx moved too quickly! 14.64709264556484,2.086094079315515,-2.3367977701338347
[18:00:34] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 5104ms or 102 ticks behind
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: The server has stopped responding! This is (probably) not a Spigot bug.
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: If you see a plugin in the Server thread dump below, then please report it to that author
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]:          *Especially* if it looks like HTTP or MySQL operations are occurring
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: If you see a world save or edit, then it means you did far more than your server can handle at once
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]:          If this is the case, consider increasing timeout-time in spigot.yml but note that this will replace the crash with LARGE lag spikes
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: If you are unsure or still think this is a Spigot bug, please report to https://www.spigotmc.org/
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Spigot version: git-Spigot-758abbe-38de0b8 (MC: 1.16.1)
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: ------------------------------
[18:01:36] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to 


知道了，是因为服务器里有些人移动太快，导致服务器超载了（注意上面标红的xxx位置，你可以翻下日志，看看是谁把服务器弄崩溃了）
[17:38:48] [Server thread/WARN]: DBLNine moved too quickly! 14.199857706543526,2.766367993957516,-8.827622912158972[17:38:48] [Server thread/WARN]: Chengjianquan moved too quickly! 5.360909214971798,2.252203340253729,8.195687532303339[17:38:48] [Server thread/WARN]: TOAST107 moved too quickly! -9.79696240291969,1.5244240882136921,-2.500246071731681terminator80018 moved too quickly! 2.2648232409177353,-3.277136369707499,9.217119135514622
[18:00:34] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 5104ms or 102 ticks behind
第5个日志里显示DBLNine，Chengjianquan，TOAST107，terminator80018移动过快导致服务器超载

[18:00:05] [Server thread/WARN]: TOAST107 moved too quickly! 14.64709264556484,2.086094079315515,-2.3367977701338347
[18:00:34] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 5104ms or 102 ticks behind




第6个日志里显示TOAST107移动过快导致服务器超载
解决方案：服务器太差，请更换

replies.author: 熊猫黑小白
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 熊猫黑小白 于 2020-6-30 05:35 编辑 

我也出现了一样的情况，Spigot端1.16.1目前很不稳定经常崩，建议你升级到paper，大部分的插件都是兼容的，包括非常出名和比较小众的插件。这是papermc的官网：https://papermc.io/
至于玩家对服务器消耗大这一方面，我个人认为换端才是最好的解决方案。
